item.title: CVE-2024-35732|2024-06-08T12:52:23.361Z -- yith -- yith%20custom%20login
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in YITH YITH Custom Login allows Stored XSS.This issue affects YITH Custom Login: from n/a through 1.7.0.
